title: Week 15 CFB Conference Championship Weekend
description:
Wendi Nix, Rod Strickland, and Sam Acho goes in depth about the Notre Dame DC Marcus Freeman being the leading candidate for the Notre Dame. Also, the CFB Live crew will elaborate on their take on SEC Conference Championship game, Big Ten Championship game, Big 12 Championship game, and the AAC Conference Championship game. Latly, Sam Acho will cover 3 funny clips that made him say, "Acho Mind!"
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The CFB Live crew breaks down the importance of the upcoming Conference Championship games this weekend and how it'll affect the upcoming CFP rankings next week.
